title: Meanwhile… Chris Evans' Boston Accent | Caviar Is The New Cocaine
description:
Meanwhile… The internet loves Chris Evans this week, especially footage of him slipping back into his Boston accent. Also, if you’re rich and looking for a good time, try a bump of caviar!
